gettysburg.common

Interface GbgGame

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TestGbgGame

    public interface GbgGame
    This is the public interface for the game service. A client should use only methods in this class.
    Version:
    Jun 8, 2017

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • endStep

        default GbgGameStep endStep()
        Ends the current step and starts the next step, if there is one.
        Returns:
        the new step or null if the game is over

      • getCurrentStep

        default GbgGameStep getCurrentStep()
        Returns:
        the current game step.

      • moveUnit

        default void moveUnit(GbgUnit unit,
                      Coordinate from,
                      Coordinate to)
        Move a unit from one square to another.
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit to move
        from - starting square
        to - final square

      • getUnitFacing

        default Direction getUnitFacing(GbgUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit
        Returns:
        the direction that the specific unit is currently facing

      • setUnitFacing

        default void setUnitFacing(GbgUnit unit,
                           Direction direction)
        Set a unit's facing. This can be done at any time during the moving phase for a player, but only one time.
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit
        direction - the direction to set the unit's facing to

      • getUnitsAt

        default java.util.Collection<GbgUnit> getUnitsAt(Coordinate where)
        Parameters:
        where - the coordinate of the square being queried
        Returns:
        the units on the square corresponding to the coordinate or null if there are none
        Throws:
        GbgInvalidCoordinateException - if the coordinate is not valid for the board

      • getSquareDescriptor

        default GbgSquareDescriptor getSquareDescriptor(Coordinate where)
        Parameters:
        where - the coordinate of the square being queried
        Returns:
        the SquareDescriptor object that corresponds to this location
        Throws:
        GbgInvalidCoordinateException - if the coordinate is not valid for the board

      • getPossibleMoves

        default java.util.Collection<Coordinate> getPossibleMoves(GbgUnit unit)
        Given a piece, return a collection of all of the coordinates of squares that the specific unit can move to from its current square.
        Parameters:
        unit - the specified unit
        Returns:
        the coordinates of the squares this unit can move to

      • endMoveStep

        default void endMoveStep()
        End the move step for the current player.

      • getBattlesToResolve

        default java.util.Collection<BattleDescriptor> getBattlesToResolve()
        This method is called after the movement step for a player is finished. It is called as the first thing in the battle step. It may be called several times during the battle step as some battles are resolved that will cause a unit to be removed from participating in a second battle more than once in the current turn.
        Returns:
        the collection of remaining battles that need to be resolved.

      • resolveBattle

        default BattleResolution resolveBattle(BattleDescriptor battle)
        Resolve a specific battle.
        Parameters:
        battle - the battle to resolve
        Returns:
        the result of the battle
        Throws:
        GbgInvalidMoveException - if there are any problems with trying to resolve the battle.

      • endBattleStep

        default void endBattleStep()
        End the battle step for the current player

      • whereIsUnit

        default Coordinate whereIsUnit(GbgUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit we are querying
        Returns:
        the coordinate of the square where the current unit is on the board or null if the unit is not on the board

      • whereIsUnit

        default Coordinate whereIsUnit(java.lang.String leader,
                               ArmyID army)
        Parameters:
        leader - the unit leader
        army - the unit's army
        Returns:
        the coordinate of the square where the current unit is on the board or null if the unit is not on the board

      • getTurnNumber

        default int getTurnNumber()
        Returns:
        the current turn number

      • getGameDate

        default java.util.Calendar getGameDate()
        Returns:
        returns a calendar object with the date and time that corresponds to the current turn.

      • load

        default void load(java.lang.String savedGameDescriptor)
        Load a saved game from a descriptor. The descriptor is a reference to some persistent storage such as a file or URL. The implementation is responsible for the details. The default does nothing. This
        Parameters:
        savedGameDescriptor - the reference to the saved game location

      • store

        default void store(java.lang.String savedGameDescriptor)
        Save a game to storage specified by the descriptor.
        Parameters:
        savedGameDescriptor - the reference to the saved game location
